sentences.en: Actually, I'm not quite sure what contraband is.
sentences.cn: 实际上我不太清楚什么是违禁物品.

sentences.en: Actually, I'm not quite sure what's contraband.
sentences.cn: 实际上我不大清楚什么是违禁物品.

sentences.en: Contraband goods were found in the storehouse of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 在旅馆的储藏室里发现了走私货.

sentences.en: I thought it was only people like Li Mei - t'ing who carried contraband!
sentences.cn: 我以为只有李梅亭这种人带私货!

sentences.en: I'm sorry. I don't quite clear what is contraband.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我不太明白什么是违禁品.

sentences.en: Is Alice quite sure what's contraband?
sentences.cn: 爱丽斯很确定什么是违禁物品 吗 ?

sentences.en: Looks pretty clean. Some contraband here, nothing twist over.
sentences.cn: 看起来很干净. 有些违禁品, 但并无大碍.

sentences.en: Most of the city markets were flooded with contraband goods.
sentences.cn: 大多数的城市市场上都充斥着走私货。

sentences.en: People who smuggle contraband goods will be punished by the law.
sentences.cn: 偷运违禁物品的行为,要受到法律的制裁.

sentences.en: The customs inspectors found no contraband in the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 海关检查员并未在这辆车上发现违禁品.

sentences.en: The customs officials confiscated the contraband.
sentences.cn: 海关官员没收了走私物品.

sentences.en: The DIRT shuts off the water so you can't flush your contraband.
sentences.cn: 条子们切断供水这样你就不能把违禁品冲掉.

sentences.en: The police have discovered out some contraband goods in his traveling bag.
sentences.cn: 警察从他的旅行包里搜出了违禁品.

sentences.en: The ship was found not to be carrying any contraband.
sentences.cn: 并未发现这艘船上载有任何违禁物品。

sentences.en: Two billion dollars worth of contraband goods were seized.
sentences.cn: 价值20亿美元的走私物品被没收.

words.tran_cn: [法]走私；走私货；[交]战时禁运品（等于contraband of war）

trans.tran_cn: 走私，禁运品，走私者，走私夹带，黑货
trans.tran_en: goods that are brought into a country illegally, especially to avoid tax
